name: OceanSnap
description:
Description :

Climb aboard your yellow submarine to discover the depths of the ocean and take the opportunity to take beautiful pictures with your camera.
Be careful your battery is not infinite but fortunately you thought to take a dynamo to recharge it.

Good luck and have fun!

Game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/ocean-snap

Credits :

Musics (from icons8.com) :
Menu by Ilya Marfin
Game by Winnie The Moog

Sound effects (from freesound.org) by Thecheeseman, Kizilsungur, EchoCinematics and Benboncan.

Tileset by Maaot

All other arts and code by us.
